meanings.definition: The act of playing a drum or drums.
meanings.sent1: The drumming echoed through the room during the music class.
meanings.sent2: I love the energetic drumming at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The drumming of rain on the roof made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced to the drumming of the music, matching its beat.
meanings.sent5: The drumming of the band was so loud, it vibrated in my chest.

meanings.sent1: The rhythmic drumming filled the air with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The drumming of the rain on the window was soothing.
meanings.sent3: The drumming of footsteps approached closer and closer.
meanings.sent4: The drumming of the wind against the house was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The drumming of the drums created a lively atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: The rhythmic beating or tapping of a drum.
meanings.sent1: The drumming of the drummer set the pace for the song.
meanings.sent2: The drumming of the sticks on the drum was steady and strong.
meanings.sent3: The drumming of the fingers on the table annoyed the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The drumming of the rain on the leaves created a peaceful melody.
meanings.sent5: The drumming of the tribal drums echoed through the forest.
